original_text:
Dazzling Diamonds
Nei casinò terrestri, Dazzling Diamonds, slot classica dal catalogo della software house Novomatic, è un gioco molto conosciuto, e questa rappresenta la riproduzione fedele per chi vuole giocare tranquillamente a casa sua.
Il tema è tra quelli più cari nel mondo delle slot machine, ossia i preziosi, in particolare i diamanti! Nel corso della storia dei giochi di slot infatti, sono state numerosissime le slot, prima terrestri e poi online, che hanno fatto brillare dei diamanti sui rulli!
La grafica di Dazzling Diamonds è molto asciutta e semplice, seguendo la tradizione delle VLT, ma non per questo risulta poco efficace, anzi, la schermata invasa da diamanti e oggetti preziosi di ogni tipo è facile da seguire, con pochi fronzoli, in modo tale che ci si possa dedicare al gioco senza distrazioni.
Se dovessimo definire in poche parole Dazzling Diamonds potremmo dire che si tratta di una slot per puristi, ossia per coloro che amano la tradizione delle vecchie slot e sono poco attratti dai nuovi giochi in cui spesso è la tecnologia più che il gameplay a farla da padrone. Inoltre, troviamo che sia molto adatta anche per i nuovi giocatori, in virtù di una modalità di gioco facile e intuitiva e delle poche regole da tenere a mente.
Struttura e modalità di gioco di Dazzling Diamonds
La struttura di Dazzling Diamonds è quella tradizionale, con cinque rulli, tre righe e sole dieci linee di pagamento. Ad ogni giro è possibile effettuare le proprie scommesse a partire da un minimo di 20 centesimi fino a 20 €, con un valore del gettone compreso tra 2 soli centesimi e 2 €.
Visto un range di puntate così ristretto, ci si potrebbero aspettare solo premi di scarso valore: vi stupirà allora sapere che il jackpot di Dazzling Diamonds è di 100.000 €, veramente tanto!
Quello che si nota studiando la modalità di gioco è che è presente un solo simbolo speciale, lo Scatter, rappresentato da un orologio d’oro, che non regalerà free spins ma delle vincite extra quando compare sui rulli per almeno 3 volte.
Manca il simbolo Wild e pertanto non si avranno jolly per completare le combinazioni vincenti, determinate da un allineamento di simboli identici su rulli adiacenti a partire da sinistra verso destra.
In seguito a una vincita di qualsiasi entità, come tradizione della Novomatic, si può accedere alla funzione Gamble che offre la possibilità di raddoppiare il premio ottenuto.
Simboli regolari di Dazzling Diamonds e loro valore
I simboli regolari di Dazzling Diamonds sono esclusivamente tematici e manca qualsiasi riferimento alle carte da gioco. I simboli con valore inferiore sono le pietre preziose: la blu e la rosa offrono un pagamento massimo di 3 € per un allineamento di 5 simboli, mentre la pietre verde e quella rossa pagano fino a 4 €.
L’anello e il mucchio di banconote e monete hanno lo stesso identico valore, con un premio massimo di 10 €, infine, il simbolo che tra tutti paga di più non poteva non essere il diamante: se compare su tutti i cinque rulli offre un pagamento di ben 100 € e, se si punta il massimo, permetterà di incassare il jackpot.

Structure and Gameplay of Dazzling Diamonds

Dazzling Diamonds features the traditional structure of a five-reel, three-row slot game with only ten pay lines. Players can make bets as small as 20 cents and as large as 20 euros, with a value of the token ranging from 2 cents to 2 euros. With such a limited range of bets, you might expect the rewards to be insignificant, but you'd be wrong. Dazzling Diamonds offers a jackpot of 100,000 euros, a truly impressive sum.

Upon examining the gameplay, you'll notice only one special symbol, the Scatter, represented by a golden clock. The Scatter doesn't provide free spins but will offer extra winnings when it appears on the reels at least three times. The lack of a Wild symbol means there are no jokers to complete winning combinations. Winners are determined by an alignment of identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from left to right.

As is tradition with Novomatic, players can access the Gamble function following a win, which provides an opportunity to double their prize.

Regular Symbols of Dazzling Diamonds and Their Values

Dazzling Diamonds' regular symbols are all thematically related, with no reference to playing cards. The lower-value symbols are gems: the blue and pink ones pay up to 3 euros for an alignment of five, while the green and red ones pay up to 4 euros. The ring and stack of banknotes and coins have the same value, with a maximum prize of 10 euros. Lastly, the highest-paying symbol is the diamond. If it appears on all five reels, players can win a prize of up to 100 euros. And if they're betting the maximum, they'll take home the entire jackpot.

Dazzling Diamonds boasts a simple and crisp design, sticking to the tradition of video lottery terminals. However, this does not diminish its effectiveness. The screen is filled with diamonds and other precious objects, making it easy to focus on the game without distraction. In other words, Dazzling Diamonds is a slot game for purists—those who appreciate the old-school slot tradition and who aren't easily swayed by newfangled tech innovations. Structure and Gameplay of Dazzling Diamonds

Dazzling Diamonds features the traditional structure of a five-reel, three-row slot game with only ten pay lines. Players can make bets as small as 20 cents and as large as 20 euros, with a value of the token ranging from 2 cents to 2 euros. With such a limited range of bets, you might expect the rewards to be insignificant, but you'd be wrong. Dazzling Diamonds offers a jackpot of 100,000 euros, a truly impressive sum.

Upon examining the gameplay, you'll notice only one special symbol, the Scatter, represented by a golden clock. The Scatter doesn't provide free spins but will offer extra winnings when it appears on the reels at least three times. The lack of a Wild symbol means there are no jokers to complete winning combinations. Winners are determined by an alignment of identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from left to right.

As is tradition with Novomatic, players can access the Gamble function following a win, which provides an opportunity to double their prize.

Regular Symbols of Dazzling Diamonds and Their Values

Dazzling Diamonds' regular symbols are all thematically related, with no reference to playing cards. The lower-value symbols are gems: the blue and pink ones pay up to 3 euros for an alignment of five, while the green and red ones pay up to 4 euros. If it appears on all five reels, players can win a prize of up to 100 euros. And if they're betting the maximum, they'll take home the entire jackpot.

Review: Dazzling Diamonds

Experienced gamblers know that Novomatic's classic slot game Dazzling Diamonds is a favorite among casino goers. Now, you can enjoy this faithful reproduction in the comfort of your own home. The theme of this slot game is one of the most cherished in the world of gambling: precious gems, particularly diamonds! Throughout the history of slot games, both brick-and-mortar and online, numerous titles have featured diamonds on the reels.

Dazzling Diamonds boasts a simple and crisp design, sticking to the tradition of video lottery terminals. However, this does not diminish its effectiveness. The screen is filled with diamonds and other precious objects, making it easy to focus on the game without distraction. In other words, Dazzling Diamonds is a slot game for purists—those who appreciate the old-school slot tradition and who aren't easily swayed by newfangled tech innovations. Moreover, it's ideal for new players due to its simple and intuitive gameplay and few rules.

Structure and Gameplay of Dazzling Diamonds

Dazzling Diamonds features the traditional structure of a five-reel, three-row slot game with only ten pay lines. Players can make bets as small as 20 cents and as large as 20 euros, with a value of the token ranging from 2 cents to 2 euros. With such a limited range of bets, you might expect the rewards to be insignificant, but you'd be wrong. Dazzling Diamonds offers a jackpot of 100,000 euros, a truly impressive sum.

Upon examining the gameplay, you'll notice only one special symbol, the Scatter, represented by a golden clock. The Scatter doesn't provide free spins but will offer extra winnings when it appears on the reels at least three times. The lack of a Wild symbol means there are no jokers to complete winning combinations. Winners are determined by an alignment of identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from left to right.

As is tradition with Novomatic, players can access the Gamble function following a win, which provides an opportunity to double their prize.

Regular Symbols of Dazzling Diamonds and Their Values

Dazzling Diamonds' regular symbols are all thematically related, with no reference to playing cards. The lower-value symbols are gems: the blue and pink ones pay up to 3 euros for an alignment of five, while the green and red ones pay up to 4 euros. The ring and stack of banknotes and coins have the same value, with a maximum prize of 10 euros. Lastly, the highest-paying symbol is the diamond. If it appears on all five reels, players can win a prize of up to 100 euros. And if they're betting the maximum, they'll take home the entire jackpot.
